d|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |rosterId| | |Data Handling Operation| |tripId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = “0“
then null else `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`| |dutyId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = “0“
then null else `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`| |crewId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`TLC`| | |code|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`CODE`| | |codeDescription|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`, `XCREW.ABSENCE a`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY id`, `XCREW.ABSENCE a`|**Tracking Duty:** `d.CODE`, `a.CODE`, `a.NAME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `id.CODE`, `a.CODE`, `a.NAME`|**Tracking Duty:** when `d.CODE` = `a.CODE` then `a.NAME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** when `id.CODE` = `a.CODE` then `a.NAME`| |startDate|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|**Tracking Duty:** `BEGIN_DATE`, `BEGIN_TIME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `DEPARTURE_DATE_SCD`, `DEPARTURE_TIME_SCD`|**Tracking Duty:** `BEGIN_DATE` + `BEGIN_TIME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `DEPARTURE_DATE_SCD` + `DEPARTURE_TIME_SCD`| |endDate|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|**Tracking Duty:** `END_DATE`, `END_TIME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `ARRIVAL_DATE_SCD`, `ARRIVAL_TIME_SCD`|**Tracking Duty:** `END_DATE` + `END_TIME`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `ARRIVAL_DATE_SCD` + `ARRIVAL_TIME_SCD`| |position|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`, `XCREW.RANK r`|`d.ASSIGNED_RANK`, `r.RANK`, `r.LONG_NAME_FCT`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.ASSIGNED_RANK` = `XCREW.RANK.RANK`
then `XCREW.RANK.LONG_NAME_FCT`| |station|**Tracking Duty:** `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`AIRPORT_C_IS_DEP`| | |status|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|**Tracking Duty:** `DMLTYPE$$`
**Tracking Duty Item:** `DMLTYPE$$`, `OLD_NEW$$`|**Tracking Duty:** when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$
